alert.note: Alert for Chattahoochee; Harris; Marion; Muscogee; Talbot; Taylor; Upson (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 18 at 12:39AM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Marion, Muscogee, southwestern Monroe, central Chattahoochee, Upson, Talbot, northwestern Taylor, southeastern Harris and southeastern Lamar Counties through 115 AM EST... At 1239 AM EST, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from The Rock to near Phenix Drag Strip, and moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...40 mph wind and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Columbus, Thomaston, Talbotton, Waverly Hall, Woodland, Yatesville, Junction City, Culloden, Geneva, Sunset Village, Fort Benning/lawson Army Air Fld, North Fort Benning, Lincoln Park, The Rock, Bibb City, Upatoi, Juniper, Columbus Metropolitan Airport, Logtown and Benning Hills. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.

area.areaDesc: Chattahoochee; Harris; Marion; Muscogee; Talbot; Taylor; Upson
